# Astro Pulsar v0.1.0

Initial release of Astro Pulsar - A fast, modern blog theme built with Astro and Tailwind CSS.

## ğŸ“¦ Installation

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/astro-pulsar.git

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev
```

Visit `http://localhost:4321` to see your blog.

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

1. Edit `src/config.ts` to personalize your blog
2. Update `astro.config.mjs` with your production URL
3. Add blog posts to `src/content/blog/`
4. Build and deploy: `npm run build`
